description.text: This spell functions like symbol of death, except that all creatures of 10 HD or less within 60 feet of the symbol of sleep instead fall into a catatonic slumber for 3d6 Ã— 10 minutes. Unlike with the sleep spell, sleeping creatures cannot be awakened by nonmagical means before this time expires.

sections.Components: V, S, M (mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth a total of 1,000 gp)
